snippet: “It is clear now that Mitt Romney is going to be our nominee,” House Speaker John A. Boehner said on Tuesday, roughly a month before Mr. Romney can amass the delegates necessary to make it official.
abstract: “It is clear now that Mitt Romney is going to be our nominee,” House Speaker John A. Boehner said on Tuesday, roughly a month before Mr. Romney can amass the delegates necessary to make it official.

headline.print_headline: 2 Republican Leaders Fall in Line for Romney
